categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: During the Hunt for the treasure of Nok Drayen, Feylara Raed lured a smuggler to her starship, the Celestial Crow, to kill them. She hoped doing this would persuade her former lover, the smuggler's rival Skavak, to get back together with her. Responding to a fake distress call, the smuggler and a companion boarded the Celestial Crow, fighting past many droids. They found Feylara in the ship's cargo bay, behind a shield.

In the year 3643 BBY, the notorious criminal Skavak was humiliated when a smuggler captain stole back their starship from him on Coruscant. The two became fierce rivals, as they both sought the treasure of the legendary crime lord Nok Drayen. Feylara Raed, a woman who had previously been in a relationship with Skavak, believed that she could win him back by killing his rival.

Feylara sent the Captain's ship a distress call. The Captain, along with their crew members Bowdaar and Corso Riggs, listened as Feylara claimed that she needed help. She said her starship, the Celestial Crow, was experiencing severe malfunctions —the engines had burned out, the power cells were fading, and she was losing life support—and was now drifting into a sun.
